Keywords: Excalibur , Mystical , X-Men
Real Name: Anna Marie LeBeau
Special Powers
EXCALIBUR, MYSTICAL PROTECTORS: Mystics team ability, but only during range attacks. Captain Britain Rogue has SAFEGUARD: Mystics team ability.
OFFERED THE AMULET OF RIGHT: Charge, Flurry. // When Captain Britain Rogue hits, until your next turn, she has, "Friendly characters within range that she shares a keyword with have SAFEGUARD: Outwit".
SURVIVING IN OTHERWORLD: Precision Strike, Steal Energy.
FOR THE CORPS!: Perplex, Enhancement.

When Scott Porter first revealed this figure on his Unboxing series, I knew that I had to have her. And she has paid off great dividends. Great numbers, fantastic keywords, and very very deadly with the right support. Certainly a prime that is worthy of the status!
